an4.78:4.1: * “Catasso imā, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā visuddhiyo.
an4.78:4.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato;
an4.78:4.4: atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati, no dāyakato;
an4.78:4.5: atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato;
an4.78:4.6: atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca.
an4.78:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato?
an4.78:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dāyako hoti sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo;
an4.78:5.3: paṭiggāhakā honti dussīlā pāpadhammā.
an4.78:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato.
an4.78:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati, no dāyakato?
an4.78:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dāyako hoti dussīlo pāpadhammo;
an4.78:6.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati, no dāyakato.
an4.78:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato?
an4.78:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dāyako hoti dussīlo pāpadhammo;
an4.78:7.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato.
an4.78:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca?
an4.78:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dāyako hoti sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo;
an4.78:8.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca.
an4.78:8.5: Imā kho, bhikkhave, catasso dakkhiṇā visuddhiyo”ti.
